Room.Name: Lithium Beach
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the entrance to the wildlife preserve of Lelion Beach and Park.
Room.LongDescription: A tall fence crosses the walkway to the west, but the gate is open and you are invited to explore the wildlife area further west. You would expect this to be a nice quiet place, form the way it looks, but you can hear a lot of people shouting and the sound of a steam organ playing music. The sounds seem to be coming from the east and farther south.
